channel.title: Pasion de las Pasiones: El Lado Oscuro del Amor
channel.description:
![darksideoflove.PNG|440x298](upload://y9BOjE4CuFvkI8d19rmWU8urvMv.jpeg)
It is the year 2030 and Humanity has settled the moon. Many nations have set up their own small moon bases manned by the best of the best. The South American nations have joined together to send their sons and daughters to settle this new land.
But even in the cold of space, passions burn hot.
Things are coming to a head in Moon base águila, A vein of valuable materials have been found close to the base and tensions amongst the nations are at an all time high. Who will end up controlling the base and capitalizing upon this valuable new resource?
Join us as we tell this tale of love, trust and betrayal... in space!!!
---
Pasion de las Pasiones is a game of Telenovela Melodrama of the trials, troubles, love and betrayal. We are playing with the Gauntlet open table policy and will use Lines and Veils and X-card as safety tools.
One player space is reserved for Pucket

item.title: Pasion de las Pasiones: El Lado Oscuro del Amor
item.dc:creator: @GerwynWalters
item.description:
@GerwynWalters wrote:

It is the year 2030 and Humanity has settled the moon. Many nations have set up their own small moon bases manned by the best of the best. The South American nations have joined together to send their sons and daughters to settle this new land.

But even in the cold of space, passions burn hot.

Things are coming to a head in Moon base águila, A vein of valuable materials have been found close to the base and tensions amongst the nations are at an all time high. Who will end up controlling the base and capitalizing upon this valuable new resource?

Join us as we tell this tale of love, trust and betrayal… in space!!!

Pasion de las Pasiones is a game of Telenovela Melodrama of the trials, troubles, love and betrayal.
We are playing with the Gauntlet open table policy and will use Lines and Veils and X-card as safety tools.

One player space is reserved for Pucket
